Team
~~~~

.. raw:: html

            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-12 text-center">
                    <div class="section-title mb-4 pb-2">
                        <h4 class="title mb-4">History of the Project</h4>
                        <p class="text-muted para-desc mx-auto mb-0">MRF-CRBLoss was started at the Center for Data Science at the New-York University. The goal was to design an innovative deep learning approach to estimate biophysical parameters from Magnetic Resonance Fingerprinting data.</p>
                    </div>
                </div><!--end col-->
            </div><!--end row-->
